actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to exempt any nonmanufacturing business or any business having 25 or less employees in States having laws regulating safety in such businesses from the Federal standard created under such act.

summary.text: Exempts any nonmanufacturing business, or any business having twenty-five or less employees, in States having laws regulating safety in such businesses, from the Federal standards created under the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to exempt any nonmanufacturing business or any business having 25 or less employees in States having laws regulating safety in such businesses from the Federal standard created under such act.
